formalParameter.defaultValue:
# -- Override the name of the chart. nameOverride: "" # -- Override the fullname of the chart. fullnameOverride: ""
# -- Replica count. replicaCount: 1
image: # -- Image repository. repository: gcr.io/google-samples/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: v5
# -- Image pull secrets. imagePullSecrets: []
serviceAccount: # -- Specifies whether a service account should be created. create: true # -- Annotations to add to the service account. annotations: {} # If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template # -- The name of the service account to use. name: ""
# -- Annotations to add to the pod. podAnnotations: {}
# -- Security context for the pod. podSecurityContext: {} # fsGroup: 2000
# -- Security context for the container. securityContext: {} # capabilities: # drop: # - ALL # readOnlyRootFilesystem: true # runAsNonRoot: true # runAsUser: 1000
service: # -- Service type. type: ClusterIP # -- Service port. port: 80
# -- Resource requests and limits. resources: {} # We usually recommend not to specify default resources and to leave this as a conscious # choice for the user. This also increases chances charts run on environments with little # resources, such as Minikube. If you do want to specify resources, uncomment the following # lines, adjust them as necessary, and remove the curly braces after 'resources:'. # limits: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi # requests: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi
autoscaling: # -- If true, create a HPA for the deployment. enabled: false # -- Minimum number of pod replicas. minReplicas: 1 # -- Maximum number of pod replicas. maxReplicas: 10 # -- Target CPU utilisation for the pod. targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 50 # -- Target memory utilisation for the pod. targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage: 50
# -- Node labels for pod assignment. nodeSelector: {}
# -- Tolerations for pod assignment. tolerations: []
# -- Affinity for pod assignment. affinity: {}
redis: architecture: standalone enabled: true auth: enabled: false master: persistence: enabled: true commonConfiguration: |- appendonly no
consul: enabled: false
imagenew: # -- Image repository. repository: harbor.idtplateer.com/guestbook/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: latest
ingress: enabled: true ingressClassName: 'guestbook' annotations: alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/load-balancer-name: 'guestbook' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: 'internet-facing' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/listen-ports: '[{"HTTP":80,"HTTPS":443}]' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/certificate-arn: 'arn:aws:acm:ap-northeast-2:960249453675:certificate/3915d0da-6dd2-4384-8fb0-558b25bf1ff4' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-policy: 'ELBSecurityPolicy-TLS-1-2-Ext-2018-06' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/actions.ssl-redirect: '443' external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/hostname: 'devgb.idtplateer.com' hosts: - host: 'devgb.idtplateer.com' paths: - path: "/" pathType: Prefix tls: - hosts: - 'devgb.idtplateer.com'

# -- Override the name of the chart. nameOverride: "" # -- Override the fullname of the chart. fullnameOverride: ""
# -- Replica count. replicaCount: 1
image: # -- Image repository. repository: gcr.io/google-samples/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: v5
# -- Image pull secrets. imagePullSecrets: []

# -- Annotations to add to the pod. podAnnotations: {}
# -- Security context for the pod. podSecurityContext: {} # fsGroup: 2000
# -- Security context for the container. securityContext: {} # capabilities: # drop: # - ALL # readOnlyRootFilesystem: true # runAsNonRoot: true # runAsUser: 1000
service: # -- Service type. type: ClusterIP # -- Service port. port: 80
ingress: enabled: false
# -- Resource requests and limits. resources: {} # We usually recommend not to specify default resources and to leave this as a conscious # choice for the user. This also increases chances charts run on environments with little # resources, such as Minikube. If you do want to specify resources, uncomment the following # lines, adjust them as necessary, and remove the curly braces after 'resources:'. # limits: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi # requests: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi
autoscaling: # -- If true, create a HPA for the deployment. enabled: false # -- Minimum number of pod replicas. minReplicas: 1 # -- Maximum number of pod replicas. maxReplicas: 10 # -- Target CPU utilisation for the pod. targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 50 # -- Target memory utilisation for the pod. targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage: 50
# -- Node labels for pod assignment. nodeSelector: {}
# -- Tolerations for pod assignment. tolerations: []
# -- Affinity for pod assignment. affinity: {}
redis: architecture: standalone enabled: true auth: enabled: false master: persistence: enabled: true commonConfiguration: |- appendonly no consul: enabled: true
consul: enabled: true
imagenew: # -- Image repository. repository: harbor.idtplateer.com/guestbook/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: latest

# -- Node labels for pod assignment. nodeSelector: {}

ingress: enabled: true ingressClassName: 'guestbook' annotations: alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/load-balancer-name: 'guestbook' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: 'internet-facing' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/listen-ports: '[{"HTTP":80,"HTTPS":443}]' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/certificate-arn: 'arn:aws:acm:ap-northeast-2:960249453675:certificate/3915d0da-6dd2-4384-8fb0-558b25bf1ff4' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-policy: 'ELBSecurityPolicy-TLS-1-2-Ext-2018-06' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/actions.ssl-redirect: '443' external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/hostname: 'qagb.idtplateer.com' hosts: - host: 'qagb.idtplateer.com' paths: - path: "/" pathType: Prefix tls: - hosts: - 'qagb.idtplateer.com'

step.command:
def projName = "Guestbook" def envs = ["dev","qa","prod"] def resources = [] def environments = [] def helmValues = ''
envs.each { env ->
def appName = (String)"${projName}_${env}" def envName = (String)"${env}" def isDev = envName.toLowerCase().contains("dev") def isQA = envName.toLowerCase().contains("qa")
if(isDev) { helmValues = (String)""" # -- Override the name of the chart. nameOverride: "" # -- Override the fullname of the chart. fullnameOverride: ""
# -- Replica count. replicaCount: 1
image: # -- Image repository. repository: gcr.io/google-samples/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: v5
# -- Image pull secrets. imagePullSecrets: []
serviceAccount: # -- Specifies whether a service account should be created. create: true # -- Annotations to add to the service account. annotations: {} # If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template # -- The name of the service account to use. name: ""
# -- Annotations to add to the pod. podAnnotations: {}
# -- Security context for the pod. podSecurityContext: {} # fsGroup: 2000
# -- Security context for the container. securityContext: {} # capabilities: # drop: # - ALL # readOnlyRootFilesystem: true # runAsNonRoot: true # runAsUser: 1000
service: # -- Service type. type: ClusterIP # -- Service port. port: 80
# -- Resource requests and limits. resources: {} # We usually recommend not to specify default resources and to leave this as a conscious # choice for the user. This also increases chances charts run on environments with little # resources, such as Minikube. If you do want to specify resources, uncomment the following # lines, adjust them as necessary, and remove the curly braces after 'resources:'. # limits: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi # requests: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi
autoscaling: # -- If true, create a HPA for the deployment. enabled: false # -- Minimum number of pod replicas. minReplicas: 1 # -- Maximum number of pod replicas. maxReplicas: 10 # -- Target CPU utilisation for the pod. targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 50 # -- Target memory utilisation for the pod. targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage: 50
# -- Node labels for pod assignment. nodeSelector: {}
# -- Tolerations for pod assignment. tolerations: []
# -- Affinity for pod assignment. affinity: {}
redis: architecture: standalone enabled: true auth: enabled: false master: persistence: enabled: true commonConfiguration: |- appendonly no
consul: enabled: false
imagenew: # -- Image repository. repository: harbor.idtplateer.com/guestbook/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: latest
ingress: enabled: true ingressClassName: 'guestbook' annotations: alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/load-balancer-name: 'guestbook' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: 'internet-facing' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/listen-ports: '[{"HTTP":80,"HTTPS":443}]' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/certificate-arn: 'arn:aws:acm:ap-northeast-2:960249453675:certificate/3915d0da-6dd2-4384-8fb0-558b25bf1ff4' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-policy: 'ELBSecurityPolicy-TLS-1-2-Ext-2018-06' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/actions.ssl-redirect: '443' external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/hostname: 'devgb.idtplateer.com' hosts: - host: 'devgb.idtplateer.com' paths: - path: "/" pathType: Prefix tls: - hosts: - 'devgb.idtplateer.com' """ } else if (isQA) { helmValues = (String)""" # -- Override the name of the chart. nameOverride: "" # -- Override the fullname of the chart. fullnameOverride: ""
# -- Replica count. replicaCount: 1
image: # -- Image repository. repository: gcr.io/google-samples/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: v5
# -- Image pull secrets. imagePullSecrets: []
serviceAccount: # -- Specifies whether a service account should be created. create: true # -- Annotations to add to the service account. annotations: {} # If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template # -- The name of the service account to use. name: ""
# -- Annotations to add to the pod. podAnnotations: {}
# -- Security context for the pod. podSecurityContext: {} # fsGroup: 2000
# -- Security context for the container. securityContext: {} # capabilities: # drop: # - ALL # readOnlyRootFilesystem: true # runAsNonRoot: true # runAsUser: 1000
service: # -- Service type. type: ClusterIP # -- Service port. port: 80
# -- Resource requests and limits. resources: {} # We usually recommend not to specify default resources and to leave this as a conscious # choice for the user. This also increases chances charts run on environments with little # resources, such as Minikube. If you do want to specify resources, uncomment the following # lines, adjust them as necessary, and remove the curly braces after 'resources:'. # limits: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi # requests: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi
autoscaling: # -- If true, create a HPA for the deployment. enabled: false # -- Minimum number of pod replicas. minReplicas: 1 # -- Maximum number of pod replicas. maxReplicas: 10 # -- Target CPU utilisation for the pod. targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 50 # -- Target memory utilisation for the pod. targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage: 50
# -- Node labels for pod assignment. nodeSelector: {}
# -- Tolerations for pod assignment. tolerations: []
# -- Affinity for pod assignment. affinity: {}
redis: architecture: standalone enabled: true auth: enabled: false master: persistence: enabled: true commonConfiguration: |- appendonly no consul: enabled: false
imagenew: # -- Image repository. repository: harbor.idtplateer.com/guestbook/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: latest
ingress: enabled: true ingressClassName: 'guestbook' annotations: alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/load-balancer-name: 'guestbook' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: 'internet-facing' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/listen-ports: '[{"HTTP":80,"HTTPS":443}]' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/certificate-arn: 'arn:aws:acm:ap-northeast-2:960249453675:certificate/3915d0da-6dd2-4384-8fb0-558b25bf1ff4' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-policy: 'ELBSecurityPolicy-TLS-1-2-Ext-2018-06' alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/actions.ssl-redirect: '443' external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/hostname: 'qagb.idtplateer.com' hosts: - host: 'qagb.idtplateer.com' paths: - path: "/" pathType: Prefix tls: - hosts: - 'qagb.idtplateer.com' """ } else { helmValues = (String)""" # -- Override the name of the chart. nameOverride: "" # -- Override the fullname of the chart. fullnameOverride: ""
# -- Replica count. replicaCount: 1
image: # -- Image repository. repository: gcr.io/google-samples/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: v5
# -- Image pull secrets. imagePullSecrets: []
serviceAccount: # -- Specifies whether a service account should be created. create: true # -- Annotations to add to the service account. annotations: {} # If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template # -- The name of the service account to use. name: ""
# -- Annotations to add to the pod. podAnnotations: {}
# -- Security context for the pod. podSecurityContext: {} # fsGroup: 2000
# -- Security context for the container. securityContext: {} # capabilities: # drop: # - ALL # readOnlyRootFilesystem: true # runAsNonRoot: true # runAsUser: 1000
service: # -- Service type. type: ClusterIP # -- Service port. port: 80
ingress: enabled: false
# -- Resource requests and limits. resources: {} # We usually recommend not to specify default resources and to leave this as a conscious # choice for the user. This also increases chances charts run on environments with little # resources, such as Minikube. If you do want to specify resources, uncomment the following # lines, adjust them as necessary, and remove the curly braces after 'resources:'. # limits: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi # requests: # cpu: 100m # memory: 128Mi
autoscaling: # -- If true, create a HPA for the deployment. enabled: false # -- Minimum number of pod replicas. minReplicas: 1 # -- Maximum number of pod replicas. maxReplicas: 10 # -- Target CPU utilisation for the pod. targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 50 # -- Target memory utilisation for the pod. targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage: 50
# -- Node labels for pod assignment. nodeSelector: {}
# -- Tolerations for pod assignment. tolerations: []
# -- Affinity for pod assignment. affinity: {}
redis: architecture: standalone enabled: true auth: enabled: false master: persistence: enabled: true commonConfiguration: |- appendonly no consul: enabled: true
consul: enabled: true
imagenew: # -- Image repository. repository: harbor.idtplateer.com/guestbook/gb-frontend # -- Image pull policy. pullPolicy: IfNotPresent # -- Image tag. tag: latest """ }
application appName, { applicationType = 'microservice' projectName = projName
microservice appName, { applicationName = appName
definitionSource = 'helm_repository'
definitionSourceParameter = [ 'repository_credential': '/projects/Guestbook/credentials/harbor_cred', 'repositoryName': 'guestbook-repo', 'repositoryUrl': 'https://harbor.idtplateer.com/chartrepo/guestbook', ]
definitionType = 'helm'
deployParameter = [ 'additionalOptions': '--create-namespace', 'chart': 'guestbook', 'releaseName': 'my-guestbook', 'version': '0.1.0', 'values': helmValues, ]
rollbackParameter = [ 'rollbackEnabled': 'true', 'waitTimeout': '300', ] }
process 'Deploy Application', { description = 'System generated process for microservice application' applicationName = appName processType = 'DEPLOY' formalParameter 'ec_Guestbook-run', defaultValue: '1', { expansionDeferred = '1' type = 'checkbox' }
property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
process 'Uninstall Application', { applicationName = appName exclusiveEnvironment = '0' processType = 'UNDEPLOY' workspaceName = 'default'
processStep 'Delete Release', { actualParameter = [ 'actionOnError': '0', 'config': '/projects/Guestbook/pluginConfigurations/helmcfg', 'errorValue': '', 'options': (String)"-n ${envName}", 'releaseName': 'my-guestbook', 'resultPropertySheet': '/myJob/deleteRelease', ] dependencyJoinType = 'and' processStepType = 'plugin' subprocedure = 'Delete Release' subproject = '/plugins/EC-Helm/project'
property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
processStep 'Delete PVC', { actualParameter = [ 'commandToRun': (String)""" kubectl delete pvc -l app.kubernetes.io/instance=my-guestbook -n ${envName} kubectl delete ns ${envName} """, ] dependencyJoinType = 'and' processStepType = 'command' subprocedure = 'RunCommand' subproject = '/plugins/EC-Core/project' useUtilityResource = '1' utilityResourceName = 'local' property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
createProcessDependency componentApplicationName: appName, processStepName: 'Delete Release', targetProcessStepName: 'Delete PVC'
property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
}
step.description:
def projName = "Guestbook" def envs = ["dev","qa","prod"] def resources = [] def environments = [] def helmValues = ''
envs.each { env ->
def appName = (String)"${projName}_${env}" def envName = (String)"${env}" def isDev = envName.toLowerCase().contains("dev") def isQA = envName.toLowerCase().contains("qa")

application appName, { applicationType = 'microservice' projectName = projName
microservice appName, { applicationName = appName
definitionSource = 'helm_repository'
definitionSourceParameter = [ 'repository_credential': '/projects/Guestbook/credentials/harbor_cred', 'repositoryName': 'guestbook-repo', 'repositoryUrl': 'https://harbor.idtplateer.com/chartrepo/guestbook', ]
definitionType = 'helm'
deployParameter = [ 'additionalOptions': '--create-namespace', 'chart': 'guestbook', 'releaseName': 'my-guestbook', 'version': '0.1.0', 'values': helmValues, ]
rollbackParameter = [ 'rollbackEnabled': 'true', 'waitTimeout': '300', ]
process 'Deploy Microservice Process', { description = 'System generated process for microservice deployment' microserviceName = appName processType = 'DEPLOY' processStep 'Retrieve Artifact', { description = 'System generated step to retrieve microservice definition artifact' processStepType = 'plugin' subprocedure = 'Source Provider' subproject = '/plugins/EC-Helm/project' }
processStep 'Deploy Microservice', { description = 'System generated step to deploy microservice' processStepType = 'plugin' subprocedure = 'Deploy Service' subproject = '/plugins/EC-Helm/project' } createProcessDependency componentApplicationName: appName, processStepName: 'Retrieve Artifact', targetProcessStepName: 'Deploy Microservice' } }
process 'Deploy Application', { description = 'System generated process for microservice application' applicationName = appName processType = 'DEPLOY' formalParameter 'ec_Guestbook-run', defaultValue: '1', { expansionDeferred = '1' type = 'checkbox' }
property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
process 'Uninstall Application', { applicationName = appName exclusiveEnvironment = '0' processType = 'UNDEPLOY' workspaceName = 'default'
processStep 'Delete Release', { actualParameter = [ 'actionOnError': '0', 'config': '/projects/Guestbook/pluginConfigurations/helmcfg', 'errorValue': '', 'options': (String)"-n ${envName}", 'releaseName': 'my-guestbook', 'resultPropertySheet': '/myJob/deleteRelease', ] dependencyJoinType = 'and' processStepType = 'plugin' subprocedure = 'Delete Release' subproject = '/plugins/EC-Helm/project'
property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
processStep 'Delete PVC', { actualParameter = [ 'commandToRun': (String)""" kubectl delete pvc -l app.kubernetes.io/instance=my-guestbook -n ${envName} kubectl delete ns ${envName} """, ] dependencyJoinType = 'and' processStepType = 'command' subprocedure = 'RunCommand' subproject = '/plugins/EC-Core/project' useUtilityResource = '1' utilityResourceName = 'local' property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
createProcessDependency componentApplicationName: appName, processStepName: 'Delete Release', targetProcessStepName: 'Delete PVC'
property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
property 'ec_deploy', { ec_notifierStatus = '0' } }
}
